doc.field: Series IV: Max and Yetta Shachtman, Friends and Associates, 1920s-1960s.
Series IV: Max and Yetta Shachtman, Friends and Associates, 1920s-1960s.

Max Shachtman - Friends and Associates (Includes group photographs with Shachtman and Gil Green, Carl Cowl, Nathan Schaffner, Al Glotzer, (William?) Schneiderman, ? Rizak, Sam Don, John Williamson, Ruth Reynolds, Pat Toohey, and John Harvey; two dossier photographs of Central European Communists, Milan F. Gozkic (Bosnian) and F. J. Mihalec (Czech).)
